changeSet.author: Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE mldataset SET attributes = '{"filter":"","mode":"query","Query":"SELECT count(*) AS ''COUNT'', probe_run_app_id,run_description,SUT,run_start_time,run_end_time,run_result FROM sre_location INNER JOIN sre_probe_run_app ON sre_probe_run_app.location_id=sre_location.location_id INNER JOIN ccl_app ON sre_probe_run_app.application_id=ccl_app.application_id INNER JOIN ccl_app_grp ON ccl_app_grp.application_grp_id=ccl_app.application_grp_id WHERE location_name IN (location_name) AND application_name IN (application_name) AND (run_date BETWEEN ''2019-09-01'' AND ''2023-12-30'') and run_result IN (''0'',''1'') AND application_grp_name IN (application_grp_name) group by probe_run_app_id,run_description,SUT,run_start_time,run_end_time,run_result;","Cacheable":"false","isStreaming":"false","defaultValues":"","writeMode":"append","params":"" ,"tableName":"","uniqueIdentifier":""}' WHERE name = 'ApplicationDetails';

changeSet.author: Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE dbs_widget_configuration SET count_column='COUNT' WHERE widget_name='Probe Runs - Total Count';

changeSet.author: Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE dbs_widget_configuration SET count_column='column1' WHERE widget_name='Total Issues' and dashboard=41945;

changeSet.author: Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE dbs_widget_configuration SET y_param='count' WHERE widget_name='Issue Count and its Originating Source' and dashboard=41945;

changeSet.author: Leap
changeSet.sql: UPDATE dbs_widget_configuration SET count_column='COUNT' WHERE widget_name='Total Incidents' and dashboard=42306;

changeSet.author: Leap
